Text: Representations for ISDA Transaction Cc drafts of two certificates which I believe will satisfy you needs Please get back to me with any comments ISDA Confirm Representations

Re Representations for ISDA Transaction Cc Sara No problem making the changes PM Dick Attached are my comments to the certificates We will need to attach the form of confirmation to be certain that each particular transaction is authorized Let me know if you have any questions Thanks See attached file EWEBISDA Confirm RepresentationsRdoc Sara Shackleton Enron North America Corp Smith Street EB a Houston Texas phone fax Dick D VARNER Dick WEBEug To eneORUS cc Bert I DUNN Bert WEBEugeneORUS AM Subject Representations for ISDA Transaction Attached are drafts of two certificates which I believe will satisfy you needs Please get back to me with any comments See attached file ISDA Confirm Representations

Re Representations for ISDA Transactionour end we would like to have the direct reference to the specific confirm I know it is a little more hassle but it works better for us politically PM Dick I never heard back from you regarding my email of I had asked if you would mind revising the forms of certificate which we will attach to each trade confirmation We would appreciate revisions to the April certificates This will be the format for all future transactions Please send revisions to Kimberly Hundl Her phone number is and fax if Thanks Sara Shackleton Enron North America Corp Smith Street EB a Houston Texas phone fax Forwarded by Sara ShackletonHOUECT on PM Sara Shackleton To Dick D VARNER Dick WEBEugeneORUSENRON cc Kimberly nron Subject Re Representations for ISDA TransactionDocument link Sara AM Shackleton Dick I am suggesting a minor change to the Power Risk Management Committee certificate to eliminate the reference to the Exhibit A If we leave the reference in the certificate you will always have to label the confirm as Exhibit A and resend the completed papers to us Please let me know if you are alright with this change If so we ask that you please resend the certificate dated April If you do not wish to make the change please resend the two certificates to which the confirmation labeled Exhibit A is attached Please call if you have any questions Thanks See attached file EWEBISDA Confirm RepresentationsRdoc Sara Shackleton Enron North America Corp Smith Street EB a Houston Texas phone fax Dick D VARNER Dick WEBEug To eneORUS cc Subject Re Representations for ISDA Transaction PM Thanks Sara No problem making the changes PM Dick Attached are my comments to the certificates We will need to attach the form of confirmation to be certain that each particular transaction is authorized Let me know if you have any questions Thanks See attached file EWEBISDA Confirm RepresentationsRdoc Sara Shackleton Enron North America Corp Smith Street EB a Houston Texas phone fax Dick D VARNER Dick WEBEug To eneORUS cc Bert I DUNN Bert WEBEugeneORUS AM Subject Representations for ISDA Transaction Attached are drafts of two certificates which I believe will satisfy you needs Please get back to me with any comments See attached file ISDA Confirm Representations

Re Representations for ISDA Transaction Cc Bert had done that but I will ask him to double check PM Sara Shackleton Enron North America Corp Smith Street EB a Houston Texas phone fax Forwarded by Sara ShackletonHOUECT on PM Sara Shackleton To Dick D VARNER Dick WEBEugeneORUSENRON cc Kimberly nron Subject Re Representations for ISDA TransactionDocument link Sara PM Shackleton Dick That will be fine However you need to attach the trade confirmation marked Exhibit A to each of your certificates since that is how each certificate is drafted Thus for the April transaction please resend your certificates with the appropriate attachments as referenced in the certificates Please call if you have any questions Thanks for your assistance Sara Shackleton Enron North America Corp Smith Street
